phrases: A Love Revival With the Ex?!
Risa, we have come to pick you up.
It is almost time for Hatsumode.
What on earth are you doing?
As expected, there are a lot of people here for New Year's Eve.
Where are darling and the others?
In the end there was no miracle, and another year passed.
The way Otani gets me so worked up every day...
What exactly is funny about me?!
I was paying you a compliment.
You were definitely making fun of me.
That grin of yours is pissing me off.
Just pretend we do not know them.
People are laughing at us again.
Well, I am just a comedienne.
So, should we go our separate ways from here?
You need to do your best from now on.
That chest you did not reveal over Christmas, reveal it now!
For a girl, you sure say some shameless things.
What is with this lack of motivation?!
Why not keep it at it until morning?
There you go saying shameless things again.
Otani-kun, you would better walk Risa home properly.
What did Nobu-chan say to you just now?
So, what should we do now?
Then let us think of something to do until morning.
Wha-What do you mean by that?
Video game arcades and karaokes places are open so let us just stay out all night.
It is New Years, after all.
So that is what you meant.
I hear the karaoke place by the train station has heaps of Umibouzu songs.
Let us go for all-night karaoke!
Hokkaido is cold but there is no point in worrying about that.
I could call you but we use the same cellphone.
Family discount plants are pretty awesome.
Even if tears of anger come,
I am not interested riding around in a fancy boat
or taking an expensive looking dog for a walk.
You are not pale enough to need to use a parasol!
Man, you do not have what it takes to do this!
I cannot believe the first thing I am hearing from you this semester is this stupidity!
You spent all night getting worked up singing karaoke?
Do not tell me you are still concerned about that Kanzaki-san?
I do not think it is even possible for Otani to like a girl like me...
But I have been rejected once already.
But you decided to keep trying anyway, did not you?
An ex is just an ex, after all.
You have your good points too.
Cannot you think of any at all?!
I mean, Otani-kun is always saying so, right?
Why not use your comedic skills to win his love?
How am I supposed to react to that?!
Come on, I am just trying to tug at your heart strings...
She sure is energetic, so early in the semester.
Say, how are things on Otani-kun's end?
Has he said anything about Risa?
Third-year students should remember that entrance exams are just around the corner.
How can I get more of a romantic mood going?
What exactly would that be like between us, anyway?
I recall something that happened back when I was a student...
But you are saying Kanzaki-san and her giant boyfriend broke up!
Still, Nakao-chi's info is not always reliable.
He bumped into Kanzaki-san the other day, and heard it directly from her.
He did not ask why they broke up,
So that is why she did not come to the party...
We do not want him to get any ideas.
So we have not told him.
I mean, last time Kanzaki-san said she just wanted to talk,
While Kanzaki-san's heart is still wounded...
And up against a girl like her, Otani-kun would...
Still, who was the one who told me An ex is just an ex, after all?
In any case, we should not let news of Kanzaki-san's breakup reach Otani-kun.
Do not bring up Kanzaki-san in front of Otani at all, okay?
And we need to take countermeasures to prevent the two of them meeting...
Are you here to see Otani?
Did not he say he would be right back after dropping by the staff room?
I told you, we cannot let them meet.
So he is already gone home?
Oh, did you two attend the basketball club's Christmas party, by any chance?
I heard that a lot of Atsushi-kun's friends went.
That is why I thought you might have gone too.
Actually, everyone is getting together next Sunday to play basketball again.
Will you be going to, Kanzaki-san?
I would like to surround myself with people in a cheery environment right now.
Truth be told, that tugged at my heartstrings just now.
I guess the thing about the breakup was true.
So, could you please let Atsushi-kun know about basketball on Sunday?
I will be on my way, then.
Hey, what are you doing saying a thing like that so casually?!
She said they are going to play basketball again.
I guess I am just a comedienne, after all.
She said there is going to be another basketball get-together.
Nakao already told me about that.
She already knew that darling would tell him!
That means she came in person just to see Otani-kun!
You two are going to come along too, right?
If Otani-kun is going, it will bother you if you do not go, right?
Imagine her making a face like this,
A guy would want to do something about that, would not he?
What are you whispering about over there?
It is really bad this time.
I have got to do something!
We have been waiting for you, Otani-kun.
They are planning on getting Otani-kun and Kanzaki-san back together.
They definitely know about Kanzaki-san's break-up too.
She is exuding an aura that says Comfort me.
Hey, what are you guys doing?
Risa, get Otani-kun's attention before he is swallowed up by that aura!
Wh-What do you mean get his attention?
Do whatever you have to, keep them from talking.
What is this, all of a sudden!
What did you do that for?!
You trying to pick a fight, idiot?!
T-Teach me how to play basketball.
What is this all of a sudden?
Kanzaki-san seems really down for some reason.
Why do not you go on over?
Why do not you go ask her yourself?
Both of you, knock it off!
I can walk over there on my own!
I will teach you how to play basketball later, Koizumi!
It is just, you do not seem well at all.
We will get to witness the moment they get back together!
What the heck are you guys doing?
We broke up, not long ago.
I think I am going to go home, after all.
I just want to be alone.
Can we see each other again sometime?
There is something I would like to discuss with you.
Right now, they are probably locked in the storage closet like before.
And when the door is opened, they will probably be together again.
You really like me that much?
It is funny, is not it?
If it is me trapped in there with him, all he can do is derive amusement from me.
In the end, a comedienne is no match for an ex-girlfriend.
I have had enough of that Otani!
So this is where you went.
If you stay in a place like this, you will catch a cold.
I was thinking Maybe Koizumi is crying again, or something along those lines.
It is been a while since I last spoke to Kanzaki.
It was pretty exhausting, for some reason.
I do not really know myself.
I wonder if there will be snowdrifts tomorrow.
Maybe someone like you is more suited for me.
Before we go home, let us go to that karaoke place by the train station again.
Every time Otani says or does something,
My whole world has been revolving around Otani, going round and round.
I have not said anything bad!
I am inviting you for some fun karaoke...
I told you to shut up!
Can we see each other again sometime?
There is something I would like to discuss with you.
Uh... I do not think I can do that.
Well, there is this one hopeless idiot...
I do not think I can do that.
The second Valentine's episode is all about the winning chocolate!
Koizumi, are you expecting to win a kiss or something?
Improve as a Girl With Winning Chocolate!!
Improve as a Girl With Winning Chocolate!!
